author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Sycamore Gap: Tree lovers talk about the impact it had on their lives
text:
Summary by Ground News Northumberland's Sycamore Gap tree on Hadrian's Wall was illegally chopped down on 27 September. The National Trust and Northumberland National Park Authority invited people to share their photos and memories of visiting the iconic landmark. After the unprecedented public response, the Trust has released a 3D image of the tree. Share menu More
